Class XdiAttributeCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractContext<EQ>
      • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractSubGraph<EQC>
        • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractCollection<XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttribute,XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttributeInstanceUnordered,XdiAttributeInstanceOrdered,XdiAttributeInstance>
          • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAttributeCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<XdiContext<?>>, XdiCollection<XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttribute,XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttributeInstanceUnordered,XdiAttributeInstanceOrdered,XdiAttributeInstance>, XdiContext<XdiAttributeCollection>, XdiSubGraph<XdiAttributeCollection>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XdiAttributeCollection.Definition, XdiAttributeCollection.Variable

    public class XdiAttributeCollection
extends XdiAbstractCollection<XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttribute,XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttributeInstanceUnordered,XdiAttributeInstanceOrdered,XdiAttributeInstance>
implements XdiCollection<XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttribute,XdiAttributeCollection,XdiAttributeInstanceUnordered,XdiAttributeInstanceOrdered,XdiAttributeInstance>
    An XDI attribute collection, represented as a context node.

    markus
